answers.answer: though people with diabetes are suppose to eat splenda stevia equal sugar not pig out on real sugar

Diabetics (hyperglycemic) should not consume refined sugar in any form - raw, cooked, or baked. Artificial sweeteners are just that, artificial. Just because they're out on the market doesn't mean one should pig out on them. Moderation is the key.
